name: Sanity: Aiken's Artifact
description:
Sanity: Aiken's Artifact is an action game developed by Monolith Productions. It was originally released in 2000. It was published by Fox Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Sanity: Aiken's Artifact on PC.
Derek Fialho and Gary Sheinwald produced the game. Guy Whitmore scored the game.
